Der Test f端r ==, != , < und >.


#include "Zahl.h"

int main()
{
	Zahl a;
	Zahl b;
	bool c;

	a.set_Zahl("21354423564534354654675645648847678657567567578");
	b.set_Zahl("33246346434365457565456856885677877976867868979");
	c = a == b;//c= false bzw 0.
	std::cout << c << std::endl;
	c = a != b;//c= true 
	std::cout << c << std::endl;
	c = a < b;// c= true
	std::cout << c << std::endl;
	c = a > b;//c= false
	std::cout << c << std::endl;

	Zahl d;
	Zahl e;
	bool f;
	a.set_Zahl("21354423564534354654675645648847678657567567578");
	b.set_Zahl("21354423564534354654675645648847678657567567578");
	f = d == e;//f= true.
	std::cout << f << std::endl;
	f = d != e;//f= false.
	std::cout << f << std::endl;
	f = d < e;//f= false
	std::cout << f << std::endl;
	f = d > e;//f= false
	std::cout << f << std::endl;




	return 0;
}
